title: Can't Post on the boards
body: When i try to post on boards topics it says i have to be at least level 6.... but i've played for nearly 2 years and am gold .-. how do i play ranked if im only level 6. rito pls.

replies.body: Sometimes it can take a little while before your boards level updates with your Summoner level. When you posted here it pushed a manual update and I can see that you're level 30 now ^_^!
